sentence.Network_en: Wings - Celebrity, sometimes protection or coverture.
sentence.Network_cn: 翅膀 - 名望, 有时表示保护或掩护.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... fixture 固定，固定物 coverture 覆盖，覆盖物 expenditure 花费，支出.
十八级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... countersign n. 口令, 暗号, 副印 coverture n. 保护, 掩护 covey n. 群, 一群, 一队.
热处理盐浴用盐类工艺材料术语... ... 4.9中性盐 neutral salt 4.10覆盖剂 coverture 4.11 再生盐 regeneration salt.

list.abs: ...e)，还有外头包覆的脆皮涂层(或称淋膜、批覆)-即考维曲(covertures)，制造外脆内软的两种口感。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from covrir 'cover'. It originally denoted a coverlet or a garment, later various kinds of covering or shelter

auth_sentence.content: This was the principle of "coverture," or civil death.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was the principle of "coverture," or civil death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was the principle of "coverture," or civil death.

auth_sentence.content: Under the old doctrine of coverture, a man owned not only his wife's property but her body as well.
